item.title: Paper
item.description: researchmapも併せてご覧ください。 Fabrication of FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy nanoparticles by high-repetition-rate UV picosecond laser ablation in water Atsuya Watanabe, Tomoyuki Yatsuhashi Journal of Alloys and Compounds 950, 169896 (2023). 10.1016/j.jallcom.2023.169896 Microstructure and tensile strength of electrodeposited Fe-rich bcc FeCoNi medium-entropy alloys A. Watanabe, T. Yamamoto, R. Miyamoto, Y. Takigawa Materials Science and Technology, 39, (15) 2028-2034 (2023). 10.1080/02670836.2023.2187973 10.2139/ssrn.3972720 Tensile strength of nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy fabricated using electrodeposition A. Watanabe, T. Yamamoto, Y.

item.title: Presentation
item.description: researchmapも併せてご覧ください。 予定 Grain growth bihavior in electrodeposited nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy Atsuya Watanabe, Takahisa Yamamoto, Koichiro Nambu, Yorinobu Takigawa IFHTSE2023, 2023-11-15. 2023 めっき法によるバルクナノ結晶FeCoNiミディアムエントロピー合金の創製 渡邉充哉, 山本剛久, 瀧川順庸 第30回機械材料・材料加工技術講演会(M&P2023) 2023-09-28. Development of high-strength bulk nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy via electrodeposition Atsuya Watanabe, Takahisa Yamamoto, Yorinobu Takigawa 大阪公立大学国際シンポジウム，大阪，2023-09-20． 水中レーザーアブレーションによるコアシェル型FeCoNiミディアムエントロピー合金ナノ粒子の鎖状構造形成 八ツ橋知幸, 渡邉充哉 光化学討論会，広島， 2023-09-06． Fabrication of FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy nanoparticles by high-repetition-rate UV picosecond laser ablation in water Atsuya Watanabe, ◦Tomoyuki Yatsuhashi. The 24th International Symposium on Laser Precision Microfabrication (LPM2023), Hirosaki, 2023-06-14.
